p: In the trypan blue exclusion assay, the absolute count of total cells in each field vs cells with characteristic trypan blue stains were counted for each plant extract-treated group. In our study, 2.5 µl and 5 µl dose of crude drugs did not show any cytotoxic effects towards PBMC. However, 10 µl of the dose showed the effects ( Figure 16a–f).
